009package GeometricOperations;
010
011import java.awt.GridLayout;
012import java.awt.Label;
013import java.awt.Panel;
014import java.awt.TextField;
015import java.util.Locale;
016
017import ij.IJ;
018import ij.ImagePlus;
019import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
020import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
021import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
022import imagingbook.common.geometry.mappings.linear.AffineMapping2D;
023import imagingbook.common.image.ImageMapper;
024
025/**
026 * ImageJ plugin for configurable affine image transformation.
027 * 
028 * @author WB
029 * @version 2021/10/07
030 *
031 */
032public class Map_Affine_Matrix implements PlugInFilter {
033
034        private static String[][] ElemNames = {
035                        { "a00", "a01", "a02" },
036                        { "a10", "a11", "a12" }};
037
038        private static double[][] A = {
039                        { 1, 0, 0 },
040                        { 0, 1, 0 }};
041        
042        @Override
043        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus imp) {
044                return DOES_ALL;
045        }
046
047        @Override
048        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
049                if (!showDialog()) {
050                        return;
051                }
052                AffineMapping2D imap = new AffineMapping2D(A).getInverse();
053                new ImageMapper(imap).map(ip);
054        }
055
056        // --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
057        // Dialog example taken from http://rsbweb.nih.gov/ij/plugins/download/Dialog_Grid_Demo.java
058
059        private boolean showDialog() {
060                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog("Enter affine transformation matrix");
061                
062                // TODO: define proper class to hold all these items (instances to be passed to/from generic dialog)
063                TextField[] txtField = new TextField[A[0].length * A.length];
064                Panel panel = makePanel(A, ElemNames, txtField);
065                gd.addPanel(panel);
066                
067                gd.showDialog();
068                if (gd.wasCanceled()) {
069                        return false;
070                }
071                
072                return getPanelValues(A, txtField);
073        }
074
075        private Panel makePanel(double[][] vals, String[][] names, TextField[] textfield) {
076                Panel panel = new Panel();
077                panel.setLayout(new GridLayout(vals.length, vals[0].length * 2));
078                int i = 0;
079                for (int row = 0; row < vals.length; row++) {
080                        for (int col = 0; col < vals[row].length; col++) {
081                                textfield[i] = new TextField(String.format(Locale.US, "%.2f", vals[row][col]));
082                                panel.add(textfield[i]);
083                                panel.add(new Label(names[row][col]));
084                                i++;
085                        }
086                }
087                return panel;
088        }
089
090        private boolean getPanelValues(double[][] A, TextField[] tf) {
091                int i = 0; 
092                for (int r = 0; r < A.length; r++) {
093                        for (int c = 0; c < A[0].length; c++) {
094                                try {
095                                        A[r][c] = Double.valueOf(tf[i].getText());
096                                } catch (NumberFormatException e) {     
097                                        IJ.log("NumberFormatException: " + e.getMessage());
098                                        return false;
099                                }
100                                i++;
101                        }
102                }
103                return true;
104        }
105
106}
